title: GODSMACK's SULLY ERNA On SHANNON LARKIN & TONY ROMBOLA Leaving The Band: "Their Departure Marks The End Of An Era"

text: Godsmack drummer Shannon Larkin and guitarist Tony Rombola officially announced their departure from the band earlier today. Fans already knew something was up prior to this when kicked Godsmack off their 2025 European tour as Sully Erna and bassist Robbie Merrill alongside Evanescence's Will Hunt filling in for Larkin, and Sam Bam Koltun of Dorothy filling in for Rombola. At the time, Erna only said in an interview that it was a "tricky question to answer right now at this stage" and that "Tony and Shannon have some personal things going on." Now Erna has issued a statement, saying that the split wasn't a decision made lightly, but that everyone was in agreement. Erna also notes that he's not sure who Godsmack will get to replace Larkin and Rombola, as Hunt and Koltun are just fill-ins for the current trek. "To our dearest friends and fans, we send this message to all of you to share some bittersweet news with you regarding a significant change in our journey together," wrote Erna. "After almost 3 incredible decades, two of our most cherished members, Tony Rombola and Shannon Larkin have decided to retire from the band permanently, on good terms, but for no other reason than to fulfill their desire to live a more simple and quiet life away from touring. "This decision was not made lightly. Tony and Shannon have been such a big part of our history, bringing their unique talents, creativity, and passion that have shaped our music and our message. Together, we have experienced countless, unforgettable moments and heartfelt interactions with fans like you around the world. We are immensely grateful for every memory we've created together. "Their departure marks the end of an era, but it also opens the door for new and exciting possibilities. We want to assure you that Shannon and Tony will always be part of our family, and their contributions will forever echo in our music. We respect their decisions and support them wholeheartedly as they pursue their own individual paths. "Robbie and I are also excited to explore new directions, and although we have not made any permanent decisions about who may replace Tony and Shannon, we will be continuing this journey together, and we look forward to sharing the decisions we make with all of you as they happen. "In the meantime, some of you may have heard, drummer Will Hunt of Evanescence, along with guitarist Sam Koltun of Dorothy are filling in for Shannon and Tony as we honor and complete our current European dates. "Thank you for your unwavering support over the years. We are grateful to have you by our side as we navigate this transition. "This decision was not made lightly. Tony and Shannon have been such a big part of our history, bringing their unique talents, creativity, and passion that have shaped our music and our message. "Their departure marks the end of an era, but it also opens the door for new and exciting possibilities. "Robbie and I are also excited to explore new directions, and although we have not made any permanent decisions about who may replace Tony and Shannon, we will be continuing this journey together, and we look forward to sharing the decisions we make with all of you as they happen.

"With love and respect, Sully, Robbie, Tony, Shannon."
